content: Non-Abstract Large System Design (NALSD) a very useful and critical skill for SREs: “By breaking down software into logical components and placing these components into a production ecosystem with reliable infrastructure, we arrive at systems that provide reasonable and appropriate targets for data consistency, system availability, and resource efficiency.”
